agents.title: CC Agents
agents.subtitle: Manage your Claude Code agents
agents.noAgentsDesc: Create your first CC Agent to get started
agents.deleteConfirmDesc: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
agents.editAgentDesc: Update your Claude Code agent configuration
agents.createAgentDesc: Configure a new Claude Code agent
agents.opusDesc: More capable, better for complex tasks
agents.defaultTaskPlaceholder: e.g., Review this code for security issues
agents.defaultTaskHint: This will be used as the default task placeholder when executing the agent
agents.systemPromptDesc: Define the behavior and capabilities of your Claude Code agent
agents.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
agents.noHistoryDesc: Run an agent to see it here

general.title: General Settings
general.customThemeHint: Use CSS color values (hex, rgb, oklch, etc.). Changes apply immediately.
general.coauthoredDesc: Add Claude attribution to git commits and pull requests
general.verboseDesc: Show full bash and command outputs
general.retentionDesc: How long to retain chat transcripts locally (default: 30 days)
general.analyticsDesc: Help improve opcode by sharing anonymous usage data

privacyPoints.noPersonal: No personal information or file contents collected
privacyPoints.anonymous: All data is anonymous with random IDs
privacyPoints.disable: You can disable analytics at any time

general.tabPersistenceDesc: Restore your tabs when you restart the app
general.tabPersistenceEnabled: Tab persistence enabled - your tabs will be restored on restart
general.tabPersistenceDisabled: Tab persistence disabled - tabs will not be saved
general.startupIntroDesc: Display a brief welcome animation when the app launches
general.binaryPathChanged: Changes will be applied when you save settings.

permissions.title: Permission Rules
permissions.subtitle: Control which tools Claude Code can use without manual approval
permissions.noAllowRules: No allow rules configured. Claude will ask for approval for all tools.

examplesList.edit: Allow editing files in docs directory

environment.title: Environment Variables
environment.subtitle: Environment variables applied to every Claude Code session

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.subtitle: Additional configuration options for advanced users
advanced.apiKeyHelperDesc: Custom script to generate auth values for API requests
advanced.rawJsonDesc: This shows the raw JSON that will be saved to ~/.claude/settings.json

hooks.title: User Hooks
hooks.subtitle: Configure hooks that apply to all Claude Code sessions for your user account.
hooks.description: Configure shell commands to execute at various points in Claude Code's lifecycle.
hooks.localNote: These settings are not committed to version control.
hooks.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Click Save to persist them.
hooks.noHooksConfigured: No hooks configured for this event

templateDialog.title: Hook Templates
templateDialog.description: Choose a pre-configured hook template to get started quickly

hooks.patternTooltip: Tool name pattern (regex supported). Leave empty to match all tools.

commands.title: Slash Commands
commands.subtitle: Create custom commands to streamline your workflow
commands.projectSubtitle: Create custom commands for this project
commands.contentPlaceholder:
Write your prompt template here...

Supported variables:
• $ARGUMENTS - User provided arguments
• @file.txt - Reference files
• !bash command - Execute bash
commands.descriptionPlaceholder: Brief description of what this command does
commands.allowedToolsDesc: Restrict this command to only use certain tools. Leave empty to allow all.
commands.examplesDesc: Click an example to populate the form
commands.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the command "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

proxy.title: Proxy Settings
proxy.subtitle: Configure proxy settings for Claude API requests
proxy.enableProxyDesc: Use proxy for all Claude API requests
proxy.noProxyDesc: Comma-separated list of hosts that should bypass the proxy
proxy.allProxyDesc: Proxy URL to use for all protocols if protocol-specific proxies are not set
proxy.saved: Proxy settings saved and applied successfully.

usage.title: Usage Dashboard
usage.subtitle: Monitor your Claude Code usage and costs
usage.trackSubtitle: Track your Claude Code usage and costs
usage.noSessionData: No session data available for the selected period
usage.noUsageData: No usage data available for the selected period
usage.failedLoad: Failed to load usage statistics. Please try again.

mcp.title: MCP Servers
mcp.subtitle: Manage Model Context Protocol servers
mcp.failedLoad: Failed to load MCP servers. Make sure Claude Code is installed.
mcp.noServersDesc: Add a server to get started with Model Context Protocol

add.title: Add MCP Server
add.subtitle: Configure a new Model Context Protocol server
add.serverNameDesc: A unique name to identify this server
add.commandDesc: The command to run the server
add.scopeDesc: Where to save this server configuration

import.title: Import & Export
import.subtitle: Import MCP servers from other sources or export your configuration
import.importScopeDesc: Choose where to save imported servers from JSON files
import.importFromDesktopDesc: Automatically imports all MCP servers from Claude Desktop. Installs to user scope (available across all projects).
import.importFromJsonDesc: Import server configuration from a JSON file
import.useAsMcpServer: Use Claude Code as MCP Server
import.useAsMcpServerDesc: Start Claude Code as an MCP server that other applications can connect to
import.mcpServerStarted: Claude Code MCP server started. You can now connect to it from other applications.
import.failedStartMcpServer: Failed to start Claude Code as MCP server
import.invalidJson: Invalid JSON file. Please check the format.
import.unrecognizedFormat: Unrecognized JSON format. Expected MCP server configuration.
import.failedImportDesktop: Failed to import from Claude Desktop
import.enterServerName: Enter a name for this server:

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Select a project to start working with Claude Code
projects.noRecentProjectsDesc: Open a project to get started with Claude Code

slashCommands.title: Project Slash Commands
slashCommands.description: Custom commands that are specific to this project. These commands are stored in
slashCommands.pathDesc: and can be committed to version control.

projectHooks.title: Project Hooks
projectHooks.description: These hooks apply to all users working on this project. They are stored in
projectHooks.pathDesc: and should be committed to version control.

localHooks.title: Local Hooks
localHooks.description: These hooks only apply to your machine. They are stored in
localHooks.pathDesc: and should NOT be committed to version control.
localHooks.notInGitignore: Local settings file is not in .gitignore

storage.title: Database Storage
storage.editRowDesc: Update the values for this row in the {{table}} table.
storage.newRowDesc: Add a new row to the {{table}} table.
storage.deleteRowDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this row? This action cannot be undone.
storage.resetDatabaseDesc: This will delete all data and recreate the database with its default structure (empty tables for agents, agent_runs, and app_settings). The database will be restored to the same state as when you first installed the app. This action cannot be undone.
storage.resetWarning: All your agents, runs, and settings will be permanently deleted!
storage.resetSuccess: Database Reset Complete: The database has been restored to its default state with empty tables (agents, agent_runs, app_settings).
storage.resetFailed: Reset Failed: Failed to reset the database. Please try again.
storage.sqlEditorDesc: Execute raw SQL queries on the database. Use with caution.

execution.taskPlaceholder: What would you like the agent to do?
execution.enterTask: Enter a task to run the agent
execution.hooksDescription: Configure hooks that run before, during, and after tool executions
execution.projectHooksDesc: Project hooks are stored in .claude/settings.json and are committed to version control, allowing team members to share configurations.
execution.localHooksDesc: Local hooks are stored in .claude/settings.local.json and are not committed to version control, perfect for personal preferences.
execution.runningConfirmLeave:
An agent is currently running. If you navigate away, the agent will continue running in the background. You can view running sessions in the 'Running Sessions' tab within CC Agents.

Do you want to continue?
